Arrange your photos however you like. OR, if you want a head start, select the Auto Arrange option and we will pre-populate the grid with the image you chose. You can always go back and change the order after!

The images you selected on the previous step appear at the bottom of the screen. PRESS your finger on the image you want to move, HOLD and DRAG the image into the grid location you want the image to appear in.

Need to CROP or EDIT the image? DOUBLE-TAP the image you want to edit to go to the pop-up screen. Pinch to crop. To edit, select the options on the bottom of the screen to rotate, flip, or apply effects.

After you have filled each spot on the grid, click the Buy It button in the top right corner to review and add the item to your shopping cart.

Country from selected address is not same as ship to country. Changing the ship to country may change the product price and availability of the items in your cart.\n\nWould you like to change ship to country and proceed with checkout?
Country from selected address is not same as ship to country.\n\nIn order to proceed you need to select address with country %1$s.

You have ordered the following products:

Our Mission is to foster creative individuality and bring on-demand printed products to people all over the world. We hope to surround people with their favorite memories and brands, to remind them of the better things in life, improving the world one creation at a time.

We have an unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. If you're not happy, we're not happy. That's why we go the extra mile to insure that we carry the highest quality products, printed by the best printers, at the best possible prices.

We have print facilities all over the world, so whether you're in the USA, India, or Laos, we can ship to you! Since inception, we've shipped to over 100 countries.

support@gooten.com for support and friends

1. Browse through our selection of products and choose the item or items you would like to purchase. We carry the highest quality products, printed by the best printers, at the best possible prices.

2. Customize your item. Choose the size, shape, layout and product options you like best.

3. Upload your images, or designs. Import from your phone, Instagram, Facebook, Flickr, Google Photos, or Dropbox.

4. Ship to any country in the world! Specify your location and choose shipping method. We've shipped to over 100 countries and counting.

5. Pay using PayPal or the credit card of your choice. Our custom credit card imaging system makes it easier than ever to pay! All of your credit card info is automatically entered with one simple photo.

6. Enjoy! We place the utmost importance on quality and customer satisfaction. We know you'll love the products! Enjoy.

This page allows you to add, edit or delete a Shipping Address.

To add a shipping address:

1) Please select the (+ Add a Shipping Address) button at the bottom of the page.

2) A new Address Form Page will appear. Please fill out all necessary fields. Once all the Address fields are filled out, please select the Save Address button.

3) If you missed a required field, a pop up in red text will alert you to what is missing and ask you to update before re-saving.

To select a shipping address you have either added or that is already listed on the screen:

1) Simply select the address you want to use and it will automatically take you to the Shipment Review Screen

Your work(s) of art is almost ready to go!

- The Shipment Review Page breaks down your order summary by item, cost(s), Shipping Method, Tax, Order Total, and the Estimated Arrival Date of your shipment(s).

- If you are ordering multiple products, this page separates the shipment by type of product, making it easy for you to edit or remove items if necessary… but we hope you love what you made and we know you will be happy with it!

- Once everything looks great in Shipment Review, please select the Enter Payment Info button in the bottom right corner, which will then take you to the Payment Page.
Unfortunately, PayPal does not accept zero-value orders. Please use Credit Card payment method.
Unfortunately, PayPal does not accept zero-value orders. Please use another promo code or add some more items to your shopping cart.

Almost done!

You're now in the Payment screen to purchase your one-of-a-kind design(s)!

Select payment method and follow the steps on the next screens.
You are in this screen because you selected to pay with a card.\n\nOnce you have entered information into each field, simply touch the Place Order button.

Gooten thanks you for your Order!
You will receive an email confirmation shortly with your order # which has a direct link to help you track the status of your artwork!


If you ever have any questions the Customer Service contact will also be in your email confirmation.
Please come back and visit us again soon, we will always be adding more products to print on!

support@gooten.com for support and friends
Changing country will potentially change the price of items in shopping cart.

Your order did not properly connect and validate with our server. You might have an issue with your connection. Please check your internet connection and try again. If you cannot validate, please contact our support.

Photo books for all of your memories
Never miss a date and send the right cards
Set your home apart from your neighbor\'s
Products you want to be seen in
Not just pictures, they are memories
Placing your order has failed twice, would you like to contact our customer support?
We guarantee that you will be happy with your order and will remake the item anytime there is an error. We\'re here for the long term, and reputation matters more than profits.
This is a placeholder. Add \"help_subtitle\" and \"help_text\" strings to your \"strings.xml\" with your own text or URL.

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Woven Blanket!

Once you select your Blanket color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Blanket color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Blanket color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Phone case.

1) Select a case color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your case color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

3) Do you prefer Matte Finish or Gloss Finish for your case & images? Glossy finish reflects light and gives it a shiny look. Matte finish has no shine. Make your selections then we automatically take you to the next step!

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Tablet case.

1) Select a case color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus (+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus (+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your case color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

3) Do you prefer Matte Finish or Gloss Finish for your case & images? Glossy finish reflects light and gives it a shiny look. Matte finish has no shine. Make your selections then we automatically take you to the next step!

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the Background/Border Color of your Shower Curtain!

Once you select your Curtain color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Curtain color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Curtain color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

Now you really get to start customizing your Acrylic Block!

Simply choose the Photo Layout/Design that you want to use and it will automatically move to the next step of customizing your Acrylic Block!

Your Photo Layout/Design Options are: -1 Photo
-9 Photos (A collage with no border, all the photos are touching, but not overlapping.)
-9 Photos (A collage with a thin black border that separates each photo evenly.)
-13 Photos (A collage with a think black border that separates all the photos evenly and has 1 picture centered.)

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Fleece Blanket!

Once you select your Blanket color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Blanket color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Blanket color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

To Edit Any Photo:

-Simply double tap any photo to be taken to the edit photo Screen.
 -Simply pinch to zoom in on the photo, or slide the photo to capture exactly what you want on your magnet!
-All the directions you need will be on that page!

 Change Quantity:

-Select the + (plus button) if you want to increase the quantity of the photo for the magnet.
 -Select the - (negative symbol) if you want to decrease or remove the photo from your order.

Add More Photos:

 Simply select the Back button to go back to the Select Photos page to access all of your photos again.

Buy it!

 -Simply select the Buy It button in the top right corner to be taken to the shopping cart, where you can re-edit, Add More Products or Check Out!

Add a Shipping Address

Please type in all of the information this page is requesting. Once all of the Shipping Address fields are filled out, please select the Save Address button.

If you missed a required field, a pop up in red text will alert you to what is missing and ask you to update before re-saving.

Make sure you use an accurate email address to ensure you will get updated information about your order!

Oops!

The address you entered was not 100% correct, but that's okay were here to help you make sure it is correct so we ship to the correct address!

This screen suggests what it should be! You have the option to Accept the address suggestion or Edit the suggestion!

This page allows you to choose the color of your Throw Pillow!

Once you select your Pillow color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Pillow color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Pillow color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your %1$s, select Next button in the bottom right corner.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look in case you change your mind while designing your %1$s on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your %1$s, select Next button in the bottom right corner.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

For every photo you select it will start at a quantity of 1 count for a magnet. When you are taken to the next screen you can adjust the quantity of each photo or remove it if you decide you do not want it.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Metal Magnets, select Next button in the bottom right corner.

This page allows you to select your pictures & art from ALL of your favorite sources!

- Upload images from your device, Instagram, Facebook, Google Photos, Flickr, or Dropbox.

- You can select one image from each source OR multiple images from multiple sources.

- Too many awesome images and not sure which will the look best? Upload multiple images so you can play around with the options. For example, on a 2 Photo Grid, you can upload more than 2 photos if you want to preview how different images will look while you're designing your Canvas on the next page.

- Notice that the photo counter in the bottom right corner is keeping track for you! After you select the images you want to try on your Canvas, click the Next button in the bottom right corner
